work.summary: Merck Global Capital Investment Planning & Reporting. Responsible for the forecasting, planning and reporting of Merck Capital Investments (2014 Budget = $1.7B) in support of all divisional areas. Harmonize and streamline capital project tracking and approval procedures. Led a total team of 12 professionals, having both Finance and Engineering backgrounds.
highlights: Streamlined capital project tracking and approval procedures

work.summary: Americas & Merck Consumer Care Mfg Operations Responsible for the development of budgets, forecasts, long range plans, inventory & capital reporting for all manufacturing plants in North America (gross spend of ~$1B), and for my first 3 months, Latin America. Led a total team of 18 professionals, spanning the US, Puerto Rico and Canada.
highlights: Developed budgets, forecasts, long range plans, inventory & capital reporting

education.institution: UNIVERSITY OF MARYLAND - COLLEGE PARK Robert H. Smith School of Business
